name: page_to_md
description: Firefox extension to save pages as Markdown

scripts.build:chrome: bun build src/content.ts --outdir chrome_build --outfile content.bundle.js --target browser --external chrome --minify --sourcemap && bun build src/background.ts --outdir chrome_build --outfile background.js --target browser --external chrome --minify --sourcemap && cp manifest.chrome.json chrome_build/manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: bun build src/content.ts --outdir firefox_build --outfile content.bundle.js --target browser --external chrome --minify --sourcemap && bun build src/background.ts --outdir firefox_build --outfile background.js --target browser --external chrome --minify --sourcemap && cp manifest.firefox.json firefox_build/manifest.json
scripts.build: bun run build:chrome && bun run build:firefox
